titles.title: Commercial Fishermen Safety Act of 2009
Commercial Fishermen Safety Act of 2009
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a business credit against income for the purchase of fishing safety equipment.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Commercial Fishermen Safety Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow commercial fishermen a business-related tax credit for up to 75% of the cost of certain fishing safety equipment. Limits the annual amount of such credit to $1,500.
